attributes.action: Non vaccinated people should still be able to go to nightclubs
attributes.background: Stop the compulsory vaccination to enter clubs and other large events, it goes against everything this country stands for, people should have the right to choose whether they have the vaccine or not  and should not be discriminated against for making that decision

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Do not require Covid vaccination passports for crowded events: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/592671

Don't restrict admission to nightclubs to only vaccinated customers: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/592668

Outlaw discrimination against those who do not get a Covid-19 vaccination: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/575801
